title: Ciara and Russell Wilson pose as Beyonce and Jay-Z for Halloween
text:
Ciara and Russell Wilson became the Carters for Halloween.

As they revealed on Instagram, they recreated Beyoncé and Jay-Z’s looks from the 2018 "Apes---" video, which was shot in Paris' famed Louvre museum.

The "Level Up" singer, 34, and the Seattle Seahawks quarterback, 30, perfectly nailed Bey and Jay’s pink and blue powder suits from the video.

Instead of the iconic Mona Lisa show in the "Apes---" video, Ciara, who professionally goes by just her first name, and Wilson posed in front of a portrait of the former president and first lady, Barack and Michelle Obama.

"From the Wilsons to the Carters to the Obamas," they captioned a short video. "Much Love & Respect. We goin Ape $#!% #HappyHalloween"

Ciara and Wilson also got their children in the Halloween spirit: 5-year old Future and 2-year-old Sienna dressed up as The Jacksons in a karaoke video for the classic, "ABC."
